vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἰωσείας (-σίας, Rec.), -ου, ὁ (Heb. יֹאשִׁיָּה),
Josiah: Mat.1:10-11 †
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A king of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ki.13.2;
son of: Amon (H0526H) and Jedidah (H3040); married to Hamutal (H2537) and Zebidah (H2080);
father of: Jehoahaz (H3059H), Jehoiakim (H3079), Zedekiah (H6667H) and Shallum (H7967J)
§ Josiah, "let" or "may Yahweh give"
Josiah, king of Judah (2Ki. 22), Mt. 1:10, 11*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約西亞 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華所醫治的"
猶大王, 在猶太人中恢復真神的敬拜, 統治31年, 約主前611年, 死於戰場 (太 1:10-11)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
约西亚这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是"耶和华所医治的"
犹大王, 在犹太人中恢复真神的敬拜, 统治31年, 约主前611年, 死于战场(太1:10-11)
